abstract: Nate Chinen reviews performance by trumpet player Avishai Cohen at Jazz Standard.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Cohen, who performed at the Jazz Standard, has a new album, “Into the Silence,” created in memory of his father.

headline.main: Review: Avishai Cohen Kicks Off Tour With a Set Both Turbocharged and Ghostly
headline.print_headline: A Set Both Turbocharged and Ghostly

snippet: Mr. Cohen, who performed at the Jazz Standard, has a new album, “Into the Silence,” created in memory of his father.
